solution_line_template: Mr. Roberts will make a total payment of ${monthly_payment} x {num_months} = $<<{monthly_payment}*{num_months}={total_monthly_payment}>>{total_monthly_payment} for {num_months} months.
Thus, the television costs ${total_monthly_payment} + ${down_payment} = $<<{total_monthly_payment}+{down_payment}={total_cost_installment}>>{total_cost_installment} when not paid in cash.
Therefore, Mr. Roberts can save ${total_cost_installment} - ${cash_price} = $<<{total_cost_installment}-{cash_price}={savings}>>{savings} by paying cash.
